name: Gold Point Vessel
description:
The drama and glamour of gold leaf collides with the lightness and accessibility of papier-mâché in this gold point vessel. A gray interior keeps things calm in this fun little object.

All paper vessels are water resistant and handmade with a stiff papier-mâché process using recycled and repurposed paper.

Size: 5 in diameter

name: Aqua Fade Bowl Set
description:
This pair of small paper maché bowls are sold as a set of two. One fades from aqua on the rim to white on the bottom and the other fades from white on the rim to aqua on the bottom.

Thin strips of paper are used to create the forms and give them a lovely texture. These little bowls are great for air plants, rings, keys, etc.

Size: Each are approx. 4 inches across and 1.5 inches high.

name: Small Gold Paper Bowl
description:
The hand gold leafed interior of this small paper maché bowl makes it almost glow. It looks particularly beautiful in low light. 

Thin strips of paper are used to create the form and give it a lovely texture. The gold leaf is sealed so it is protected from normal wear and tear. This little bowl is great for air plants, rings, keys, etc. 

Are you getting married? I'd love to make a custom order of these paper bowls for your guests. They look beautiful as a table favor. Just ask me about bulk pricing.

White on the outside, gold leaf on the inside.

Size: approx. 4 inches across and 1.5 inches high.

name: Tiny Gold Lip Dish
description:
The Gold Lip Dish is handmade with an uneven lip that looks gorgeous when stacked. This dish is perfect for small items like rings, keys, change etc. Made with white earthenware that is unglazed on the outside and finished with a clear, glossy glaze on the inside. The rim is gold leafed and sealed with a satin sealant to keep the leaf protected. The glaze is food safe.

Each dish is totally unique with a slightly different shape.

Approx. 1.5" across
